Mission Orders

Blood Legion troops in Thulsa's Ebon Tower depend on eternal hearts to resurrect.

Destroy Ksharan {@LinkCreature:473#2001#dreadreapers}, {@LinkCreature:473#3001#cleavers}, {@LinkCreature:473#3002#snipers}, and {@LinkCreature:473#4005#darkweavers}, as well as {@LinkCreature:473#5001#dark magisters} and {@LinkCreature:473#5002#eldritch priests}.

Bring their eternal beating hearts to Raneria in Habere when the mission is complete.
Youâ€™ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
